physical_quantity: Combined geometric and electrostatic mismatch between A-site and B-site cations relative to the anion size
information_required: ionic radii of A, B (and B′ if double perovskite), and X
oxidation states of A, B (and B′ if double perovskite), and X
why_it_matters: This CV captures how the size and charge differences between cations influence the distortion and stability of the BX₆ octahedra and overall perovskite framework, reflecting both geometric fit and charge balance in a single scalar that generalizes across oxides and halides.
definition: For ABX₃: CV = (n_A * r_A + n_B * r_B) / (|n_A * r_A - n_B * r_B| + r_X); For A₂BB′X₆: CV = (n_A * r_A + n_B * r_B + n_B′ * r_B′) / (|n_A * r_A - n_B * r_B| + |n_A * r_A - n_B′ * r_B′| + r_X)
